pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Anomalies in Data // An implementation of CAPA (Collective And Point Anomaly) by Fisch, Eckley and Fearnhead (2018) arXiv:1806.01947 for the detection of anomalies in time series data. The package also contains Kepler lightcurve data and shows how CAPA can be applied to detect exoplanets.
